Package org.w3c.dom.views

The org.w3c.dom.views package provides the Java ME DOM Views API defined by JSR 280.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbstractView A base interface that all views shall derive from.
DocumentView The DocumentView interface is implemented by Document objects in DOM implementations supporting DOM Views.
 

Package org.w3c.dom.views Description

The org.w3c.dom.views package provides the Java ME DOM Views API defined by JSR 280. The API is derived from the W3 DOM2 Views API (http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/REC-DOM-Level-2-Views-20001113). The initial version of the JSR 280 modifications was published in October 2006.
